website_summaries.verdict: Ideal choice for those who prefer squirting over spraying.
pros: Reviewers like that this works with the floor-cleaning tool you already own – no need to buy a new mop
Almost everyone loves the light, nutty smell
Works on all types of wood
Bonus points for company's dedication to environmental causes
cons: If you're sensitive to smells, this might not be the best choice

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna go into detail there are other better reviews on this product. I will do a short bullet point. -Cleaned well -Mild Almond Fragrance -No residue -Floors look shiny however they are not slippery -Overall my family likes this product
customer_reviews.author: CastleTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Works Great For Older Wood Floors
customer_reviews.text: The floors in our house are older and dull looking. Method Wood Floor Cleaner brings life back into the them and it smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Love this for our wood floors
customer_reviews.text: This product is a re-purchase for me, which makes it stand out. We love the scent, it is easy to squirt onto your floors and then mop over and leaves a great shine. I don't use this to do any heavy duty cleaning, but more of an in between application if my floors are just needing a light mopping and not a deep clean. It dries quickly which is a big plus and the scent lingers.
customer_reviews.author: A.fireinside

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, and I love the smell. Originally switched to eco-friendly (well, friendlier) products at the recommendation of our vet because I noticed my dog was sneezing after we cleaned our floors - and now that we moved to a place with all hardwood floors, I wasn't sure what to use so I've tried out a few different products. This cleans nicely and has a really nice, light almond scent to it.
customer_reviews.author: jw408

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smells like Johnson&Johnson baby shampoo, not like almond. Left my floors with a sticky, waxy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Wonderful and Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Bamboo floors that are in my kitchen, living room, front entry, and hallway to the garage. The smell is a wonderful almond smell. I actually put the liquid into a spray bottle. It leaves the floor shiny and leaves a nice aroma throughout the entire downstairs. For those dried spills, I spray this on let it sit for a a few seconds, then it wipes clean. I Subscribe & Save to this item and it usually takes me a couple of months to finish the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I am addicted to Method's floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to try Method's floor cleaner?? The almond scent makes me want to mop the floor. I love that it is plant-based. It absolutely does not leave a residue. So easy to use when I decant it into the smaller-sized (25oz) bottle of the same product, which has the squirt top. 25oz cleans my entire first floor of EVP plank luxury vinyl. I use it with the industrial spray mop with washable cloth pads that I purchased 20+ years when my child was born (I was fascinated by how fast the cleaning lady mopped the floors in the hospital room I just had to have one), way before Swiffer was born.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Method floor cleaner and other Method products! I bought this to refill the smaller bottle with the spray nozzle lid. I've been using it on my wood floors and they smell good like almond the rest of the day. It dries pretty fast and doesn't leave smears once dry. It also hasn't made my floors sticky or slippery which is nice. I use an old swiffer floor broom/mop with a reusable/disposable cloth on it, spray this on the floor, and spread it with the swiffer to distribute and clean. I've been debating getting a different style mop where I can put the cleaner directly in the reservoir on the mop to spray as I push it around.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about the smell. Works well, but not as well as Bona.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this one-and I still do, just not as much as other products I have used in the past. I have old, 80 yer old hardwood floors and they are slowly losing their shine. This product worked pretty well, but definitely not as well as Bona, which I have used in the past. Although I do like the fact that the product does not leave greasy residue like some products sometimes do. One thing I definitely wasn't crazy about was the SMELL. Not my favorite for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ania Broz-St

customer_reviews.title: Slightly concerned about residue
customer_reviews.text: We've gotten tons of compliments on how our house smells after using this product. It's just an amazing scent. However, my wife and I have gotten a little concerned about the residue it leaves behind. We never really noticed it on our light colored oak hardwood floors but after my wife tested this out on our dark wooden kitchen chairs, we noticed quite a bit of leftover oil/wax? Almost like water spots on a car. We now alternate this with more traditional cleaning products for our floor.
customer_reviews.author: SoftwareDevJsn

customer_reviews.title: The scent is a bit strong but I like it. It keeps from streaking and cleans the ...
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning my floors so much easier! I spray this and steam mop. The scent is a bit strong but I like it. It keeps from streaking and cleans the floors well. I have been adding a little vinegar if the floors are ultra dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Corleen Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Sticky floors
customer_reviews.text: We have all hard wood floors downstairs that I mop. So tried spraying this, although smells nice - like bitter almonds it leaves the floor very sticky and after drying we see footprints everywhere. Now I just am trying to get rid of it. I clean the kitchen cabinets and bathroom cabinets only.
customer_reviews.author: Rushkami

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my wood floor. I thought that this would be a really good product after reading all the reviews. The smell is very good and at first it seemed like it was doing a beautiful job on my wood floor. Now after a few months the floor seems to have a coating. It doesn't seem to be cleaning as well as when I first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Really great day

customer_reviews.title: This works well on my wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: When I moved into my new house they told me "Do not use Swiller on these floors, Floor Cleaner only" So I switched to a floor cleaner from our Hardware store. I noticed my daughter had the Method brand, so I tried it. It is very good and has a better smell than the other floor cleaner I was using. I like the Method Floor Cleaner, it cleans well and leaving my house smelling so good!
customer_reviews.author: plplpj

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing ! Streak free !
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It has an incredibly pleasant almond smell and does not leave streaks. I use it on virtually any flooring service including laminate, tile, and vinyl, and it produces an outstanding result on all of the above. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DWB

customer_reviews.title: Been Using for Years
customer_reviews.text: I have loved the Method floor cleaner for years. I have used it on hardwood and most recently on the laminate flooring that looks like wood. It smells amazing, works well, and hasn't left a residue behind on my floors. Super easy to use. I purchased the regular bottle and now have used this to refill it so it is easier to actually utilize as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalGSB

customer_reviews.title: Buy in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: We already had the container that disburses the cleaner on the ground, we just need the actual cleaning solution and this fit the bill perfectly. No packing to deal with; just pop the top, pour into your disbursement container, and you're off and cleaning. I highly recommend this product due to the price and the cleaning power!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Hands down my favorite wood cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I’ve used Murphy’s Oil for my hardwood floors and furniture until My local store ran out of stock and I had to opt for this. I’m sensitive to scents so I was very hesistant to try something new thats also scented. To my surprise, the scent is actually pleasant and not overwhelming. It doesn’t leave my floors as shiny as Murphy’s Oil, but I’ve been adjusting the water:solution ratio to my liking. Overall, it gets the job done while leaving my whole home smelling great!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMomma

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on wood floors sadly.
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and price but it doesn’t work. My floors look duller after use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the almond scent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the almond scent. It's subtle and not overwhelming, but it also sticks around for a while. I put this in a squirt bottle and spray it on the floor while I am mopping with a wet mop pad. Does a great job. And it doesn't leave a gross residue on my floor like many cleaners do.
customer_reviews.author: Drey

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great —Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves the scent of this cleaner and it works beautifully! Fragrance is mild and subtle, but very fresh. Purchased the small bottle from the grocery store. Once I had used it twice, I purchased two large refill bottles. The scent is not sweet, not masculine. It’s right in the middle. We have three dogs and four teenagers so it’s amazing to find a cleaner that works so well AND smells like home, not a cleaner. Does not streak. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: I was making my own solution until this!m...
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love! Recently moved into a new place and I had been using the regular swiffer and wet wipes. I was making my own solution with fabuloso and bleach LOL. The smell isn’t too potent, but you can still smell it. It leaves a little shine and it truly cleans! We have that faux wood type floor and I have two small kids, so this solution was a necessity!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Wright

customer_reviews.title: Leavesa residue, streak and looks dill
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to find a hardwood floor cleaner that doesn't leave a dull looking residue on the floor. After a couple of days of walking on it with socks and what not it seems to shine back up, but right after my mopping it looks dull and dirty. I don't know why this has good reviews. The only thing good sbout this product is the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: SAFE & CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this! I also love it because you don’t have to dilute it & you don’t have to rinse floors before or after. It’s very easy to use & it’s great for households with children or pets because it’s natural & safe! It also dries pretty quickly. It is a tad bit expensive, but nothing to complain about. I would 100% recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Fitz ☘️

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well-both wood and tile floors.
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler in the house so I need to clean the floors so often. And I need to use something safe. This method cleaner claims to be both. It does clean both my tile and wooden floors well and I use it to fill up the tank for my spray mop so that makes it even easier to use. The scent fades away very fast but I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Menna

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: I have an enormous amount of hardwoods (mostly entire house). Really like the smell and it's not sticky or slippery like some other cleaners. It doesn't smell of heavy chemicals and is natural. I have to do heavy cleaning with multiple dogs in house. Although I don't use this every time because I would go through bottle within a couple months, it's nice when we have guests over.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Rating: A++++¥
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this product when I bought it from a local store. I loved it but I couldn’t find the small bottles on Amazon so I opted for the big bottle. I love it! The smell is amazing and I use it on my laminate floors. I was nervous because I don’t want to ruin them but this product never soaked it, it cleaned the floors nice with a slight shine and smells amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Leaves floors shiny!
customer_reviews.text: Love method hardwood cleaner!! It leaves my floors shiny, clean and it smells nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cleaner for Engineered Wood Flooring
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite cleaner for engineered wood flooring. I have tried others that leave a greasy film on the floor. This floor cleaner leaves a streak free shine not to mention a very lovely, light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of almond so I am in love with this floor cleaner. It does a great job cleaning my hardwoods. Leaves no streaks or residue. I've used Bona for years, but I thought I'd give this a try because of the scent. Won't be switching back as this is 1/4th the price and smells better!
customer_reviews.author: DiamondsRForever

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and a great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff for all my wood floors. I love the smell andI was happy to find that I could buy the large refill bottle. One of a number of Method products that I use regularly as I dislike the harsh smells of other cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty great. We have 200 year old wood floors, and Method is the only thing I really like using on them. It's not abrasive at all, and the scent is nice and light - and I usually get headaches from the scent of cleaning products. I'd like to see a refill like this for the lemon version.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue on floors.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this; it's easy to use and smells very nice. Unfortunately it left a residue on my wood floors that almost immediately turned to smudges when walked on. I even diluted it with water, but it still leaves a residue.
customer_reviews.author: GaKaye

customer_reviews.title: Works well, I like the smell too
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work really well. I use it on our hardwood kitchen floors and especially in front of the stove it sometimes gets really greasy from cooking bacon and so on. I just swipe with my mop and this floor cleaner over it and it gets it nice and clean. Big bonus: It smells really good! No unpleasant chemical smell, no super overpowering smell. Very light almond scent which is really pleasant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let you floors shine and house smell great!
customer_reviews.text: We have wood laminate floors throughout the whole house. We use this to clean our floors every two weeks. And spot clean as needed. Every six months we mop the floors with a cleaner and then we use this again to shine. The whole house smells so good afterwards!!
customer_reviews.author: lcarey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty much water with a bit of almond extract added to it. It cleans that same way, but doesn't offer any protectant for your floors. I smells OK if you're familiar with artificial almond scent. This was subbed in for us on a Subscribe & Save offer, and we are done.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Smells like baby soap, poor value.
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all — this product smells like baby soap. Also, Method should consider making a concentrate... you are essentially paying to have water shipped to you. I prefer a product meant to be diluted at home. Usually better value that way.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent - Works great
customer_reviews.text: It makes cleaning my hardwood floors pleasurable. Loved the Almond scent
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Great floor cleaner, easy to use and apply.
customer_reviews.text: The Method Squirt + Mop Hardwood Floor Cleaner is probably one of the easiest ways to clean hardwood floors. It is easy to use and apply, gives the floor a wonderful shine and temporarily seals it. In addition, the smell is pleasant and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and good smelling floors
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this at Target in a smaller size for 4.99. This set has 2 much larger sizes for a great price! I love the smell of my house after using this product on my floors. Just a nice soft scent with no cleaning product smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jen LaDuke

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard wood floors
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something which is great for hard wood floors and also safe for kids. This fits both the requirements. The only down side is that it has to be used in greater quantity than traditional floor cleaners which makes this a little expensive
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of my floors after using this. It cleans the coffee/tea/gritty spills just fine. Just a whiffer mop/cloth and a few squirts per section goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Faye

customer_reviews.title: The best hardwood cleaner I have used.
customer_reviews.text: The only product I will use on our hardwoods. It smells great. Dries quickly. Cleans well without damaging the wood. Leaves floors with a natural shine. No residue.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Williams

customer_reviews.title: It did smell good though.
customer_reviews.text: Left filmy residue on my fake hardwood floors. I thought was going to make them shiny, but no. It did smell good though.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love Method products in general and I love this hardwood cleaner as well. It does a great job and it smells wonderful. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny's girl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shine to floor.
customer_reviews.text: I have laminate flooring. I mop/ clean with this periodically. It makes my floors shine like new. Smells wonderful. Kinda strong, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things! I love this product! It smells amazing, works great and is pet friendly! Super easy to use and makes mopping a breeze. 15/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It smells good. I added a little solution with  lots of water
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this product. I put a little bit of solutions in the container and added lots of warm water to it. My floor was clean and smelly awesome
customer_reviews.author: Faithful

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my floor without the actual mop it's meant for. It smells absolutely amazing. I could mop in the am, leave for work and then come back and ot still smells great.
customer_reviews.author: jill mayberry

customer_reviews.title: This is the best floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floor cleaner. It does a great job, is PET SAFE, and smells amazing! It leaves my floors shining and looking amazing and makes the whole room smell fantastic! I wouldn't ever use anything else, especially to keep my kitties safe! (many other floor cleaners are incredibly toxic to animals - especially Swiffer Wetjet) I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 for cleaning wood flooring
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate wood floor cleaner. I usually spray it onto the floor and go over it with warm water and let air dry after. Loosens dirt, makes the floor shine without any residue. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Bought because the pine sol didn't seem to be doing a good job. This didn't either. Not terrible, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Lamontagne

customer_reviews.title: Leaves sticky residue
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the way that my floor looks after using this product. Unfortunately, it leaves a sticky film on my floor, which ultimately defeats the purpose of this product.
customer_reviews.author: reb

customer_reviews.title: Method Hardwood Floor Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is good on all types of wood floors and the almond smell is just heavenly. It is so easy to use and is the only cleaner I use on my hardwood floors. I recommend it wholeheartedly. It is with every cent and really is a great value. Although it can be found in some stores, with Amazon Prime it is delivered free right to your door. And if you prefer, it can be delivered on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Little old lady in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings!
customer_reviews.text: I do like the shine and sent that it leaves, but it is extremely sticky. If you walk barefoot over the floor after it dried, you feel your foot stick on the floor. You have to really work it into the floor in order not to leave some marks on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be a repeat buyer for this! Made my hardwoods shiny with little effort and it smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hoyle

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you love an almond scent this stuff is amazing! It smells like almond oil, cleans well, dries really fast and doesn’t leave a sticky residue! This is all I will use in our wood floors anymore
customer_reviews.author: KNLB

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, usually get it at target but amazon is more convenient sometimes. Use on hard wood floors and the house smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hardwood cleaner! We have a kitty with IBS and often have little messes to clean up and this works great on our original hardwoods. Does not leave a residue and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: lanecat

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love the shine It gives on my floors! Nice, mild scent. I transferred It over to a spray bottle and spray my floors before I swiffer!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bromberg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Ruins wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Leaves build up. I like other method products, however this product is a complete waste of money! Would not give a single star if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner without leaving residue or stickiness on floor
customer_reviews.text: I really like Method products and this one doesn't disappoint. It doesn't have to be rinsed off and doesn't leave a residue on the floor. Others left the floor feeling a little sticky but not this one. I'm using it on laminate and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: It really works on hardwood
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s really easy to use and keeps a shine on my hardwood floors better than most other products.
customer_reviews.author: Zimster

customer_reviews.title: Better price.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for 10+ years on our hardwood floors. Better price than Target and shipped right to our door - so no need for a special trip. I only gave the scent 4 stars b/c I am not crazy about the almond scent however the rest of the family does like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Works good on bare wood
customer_reviews.text: It cleans and doesn’t dry up the wood. Make sure after spraying let it sit a couple seconds before wiping.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Too thick ...
customer_reviews.text: My floor gets sticky after using this stuff. And I am not a fan of the smell either. It’s not the smell of almond.
customer_reviews.author: Phanxie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful hardwood floor cleaner! Makes my house smell is amazing! And gives great shine to my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reich

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for great cleaning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Are you are looking for a good quality wood cleaner? This one is it. Not only does it smell nice and nutty, (it is not strong at all, just the right amount) it cleans amazingly well!!!! This is all I'll use on my Mahogany wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: W. W

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Love this floor cleaner. Have been using it for years, and it seems very gentle yet effective on my floors.
customer_reviews.author: kjc_charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Must have for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Must have for real wood floors. Stopped getting this in my Grove Co order and ordered from Amaz,on, cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Wascom

customer_reviews.title: best hardwood cleaner
customer_reviews.text: its just great. leaves a great finish. smells good. great value. what's better? nothing.
customer_reviews.author: mike higgins

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good; cleans so hard
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, and I am not really a person to get excited about cleaning products. It smells almost like sweet almonds and cleans great, plus it is safe for the environment and non-toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Leah in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great product to clean hardwood
customer_reviews.text: Love how this works on my hardwood floors. Keeps them looking great and the almond smell is very nice
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I love cleaning my wood floors with this because it cleans very well and the smell is nice!!!I have been using it for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Erika V.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floor cleaner. It makes your room smell great and cleans nicely. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of method company
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wood cleaner! I’ve using it for years love the smell and like how it protects my wood floor !
customer_reviews.author: Elena Darii

customer_reviews.title: Natural - Clean - Fresh
customer_reviews.text: With pups that find crumbs and lick the floor, this natural product works for us. As a bonus, our house smells amazing after the wood floors are cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: OBXSCAPE

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I clean houses for a living not only does method hardwood floors cleaner work it smells so good I love the whole method line.. Will be buying more and I recommend Amazon to all my co works it's fast easy and they always deliver..
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t use any other floor cleaner now! Love Method Almond cleaner. Cleans well and smells great. Light scent. Purchased the lemon also because I usually like the lemon scent better. Nope. Lemon smelled good but I liked the almond scent better. A bit like baby powder. Fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rene M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product ever since I bought it at Target. It smells amazing and works great. Works with non-steam and steam mops.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Still the best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I’ve sworn by Method products for 20 years now! This is a great price for these safe and great smelling products!
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! We have four dogs and kids on property- it smells and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Seth H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You had me at the almond scent! Works great on my hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DY

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for my floors!
customer_reviews.text: This is all I use on my hardwood floors throughout my home. Leaves a beautiful shine and faint scent of almond. Definitely recommend. Two big bottles at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling product w/o all the chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this cleaner is AMAZING. It does a great job cleaning. I've used it on tile as well as wood and it doesn't leave any film or residue. I will definitely continue to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela P

customer_reviews.title: Gets Dirt Off, Has Moderate Shine
customer_reviews.text: Value for the buck. Easy to use. Improvement over my prior method of cleaning. Moderate shine which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen King

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product with a great scent of Almond
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend the other product I have used in the past, Bona, which did a better job and was comparatively cheaper. But this is a good product too with better scent compared to the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Karan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite hardwood cleaner!!! I love this stuff!! I put it in my refillable Bono Mop!! Easy and Cleans GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the floor well, smells like almonds, gives hardwood floors a shine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Szary

customer_reviews.title: Almond smell
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I usually use murphys oil soap. This is great cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: kathleens

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite floor cleaner, fresh scent, no streaking and value priced!
customer_reviews.author: ESJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you will love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It smells great . It's works even better!
customer_reviews.author: Chris t.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff with a really nice smell that lingers
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stuff with a really nice smell that lingers. Not an unpleasant "cleaner" smell, but a lovely almond "clean" smell. Only thing I use on my hardwood floors, and they always look great...until the dogs come back in with their muddy little paws.
customer_reviews.author: KarenH

customer_reviews.title: PU
customer_reviews.text: I cannot STAND the smell of this. It takes a lot for me to be bothered by fragrance. I am frugal and don't like wasting product, but this needs to hit the trash.
customer_reviews.author: M.Owens

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: We work with it and the customers really like and also do we! Very good!
customer_reviews.author: AlexandreCA

customer_reviews.title: Love the shine, but leaves a film
customer_reviews.text: It leaves a residue, kind of sticky when walking barefoot. I use a reuseable microfiber pad. Do I use too much, or should I use a damp pad instead of a dry one? The scent is a bit strong at first. After a few hours it wears off a bit.
customer_reviews.author: CatRob

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and smell great. It dries fast and shines the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Blessings

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm... the smell...
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a daily cleaner for my floors. We personally love the scent, which may not be for everyone. Doesn't leave any haze or residue. I use Weiman polish once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Deals
customer_reviews.text: Used to get the bottles from walmart and found a better deal here.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Codd

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy anything else from now on!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hardwood floor cleaner I have ever used. Glad I bought the refill bottle as well. Floors come our looking beautiful and the almond scent is a clean wonderful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: Method Squirt + Mop Hardwood Floor Cleaner Refill, Almond, 68 Ounce
product_meta.description: We used to reserve our floor cleaning for very special occasions—like limbo night or the queen’s visit. But this biodegradable no-wax wood floor cleaner turns a chore into an almond-scented delight. Just squirt, mop and bask in the glow of a gleaming clean. Formulated for sealed hardwood and laminate floors.
feature_bullets: Contains (1) 68 ounce refill bottle of hardwood floor cleaner.
Plant based, surface safe and biodegradable cleaner formulated for sealed hardwood and laminate floors.
Easy to use, just squirt and mop. No need to rinse.
Use to refill ergonomically designed squirt + mop shower nozzle spray bottle.
This almond fragrance is delightfully rich and nutty.
